name: A Scoundrel in the Underlair
description:
Head out into the woods and find the dreaded Underlair...

'A Scoundrel in the Underlair' is a simple Tradition Turn-Based Roguelike in which you play a lone warrior searching for The Underlair, a legenday subterranean dungeon said to house a great, ancient secret...

You will start your quest in the Village. The Villagers are waiting to help you with Weapons, Armour, Items and Quests whenever you return from crawling the depths of The Underlair.

Can you uncover the secrets hidden beneath your feet?

Features
  • Turn Based Dungeon Crawling
  • Loot
  • Procedurely Generated - A different game every time
  • Character Creation
